title: Plan Summary: Replay Diagnostics UX
content:
## Replay Diagnostics UX

**Plan ID:** plan_mlmuoa9v_e40d8edf
**Completed:** 2026-02-15
**Priority:** high

### What Was Accomplished
- Delivered additive explainability metadata and rollups across replay diagnostics outputs (JSON, markdown, gate summary, and annotations).
- Preserved backward compatibility by keeping legacy output behavior unchanged when explainability data is absent.
- Added and validated targeted replay test coverage for compatibility and explainability render behavior.
- Completed final RUN-gate comparator regression fix and verified compile + replay tests green.

### Key Decisions Made
- Contract changes remained additive/optional only; no removals/renames of existing fields.
- Markdown and annotation explainability content emitted conditionally to minimize noise.
- Compatibility-first approach prioritized parse-stable legacy formats and optional suffix metadata.

### Files Created or Modified
- Project-Memory-MCP/vscode-extension/src/test/replay/core/types.ts — additive explainability types.
- Project-Memory-MCP/vscode-extension/src/test/replay/core/Comparator.ts — explainability behavior and final regression fix.
- Project-Memory-MCP/vscode-extension/src/test/replay/core/GateEvaluator.ts — additive rollups/annotation behavior.
- Project-Memory-MCP/vscode-extension/src/test/replay/core/ReportWriter.ts — conditional markdown explainability rendering.
- Project-Memory-MCP/vscode-extension/src/test/suite/replay-harness-core.test.ts — compatibility/explainability test coverage.

### Lessons Learned
- Scope-tight fixes and targeted replay gates reduced churn and accelerated final stabilization.
- Optional explainability additions can improve triage quality without increasing default report noise.

### Test Coverage
- Replay-focused run reports 192 passing, 0 failing in final validation.
- Coverage includes JSON compatibility, markdown conditional explainability sections, and annotation optional suffix behavior.
